name: xcvb: The Photosensitive Epilepsy Friendly Version
name_original: xcvb: The Photosensitive Epilepsy Friendly Version
description:
The Newgrounds Game Jame 9 Game. With over 50,000 views on Newgrounds. Minus The Seizures. Made in 48 hours. With this having some time taken to remove the eyesore flashing images.

XCVB is an arcade puzzle game with a steep learning curve and an interesting mechanic. Players must maneuver their way through levels using the controls XCVB. You play as an L shapped arrow where the controls are: X to left and right. C to up and down. V to go in the direction of UP or DOWN. B to go in the direction of Left or Right. Get to the end of the levels. The game gets faster as you go along. Since being released it has received over 47,000 plays on newgrounds as well as post on Indie Statik and Gameological Sawbuck Gamer. It acts as the sort of prototype for Super XCVB. The full release title for PC currently in the works by xcvb Studios
